results.title: Looking Beyond a Dancer’s Confident Grace in ‘States of Hope’
results.abstract: Hope Boykin radiated generosity and joy as a performer. As a choreographer and director, she is showing the struggle the audience couldn’t see.

multimedia.caption: Hope Boykin, a former star of Alvin Ailey American Dance Theater, whose latest work as a choreographer, “States of Hope,” will be at the Joyce Theater.
multimedia.copyright: Erik Tanner for The New York Times
